about_the_game:
Dr. Agnes Shelley wants to steal your eggs, but you're not about to let that happen. Single Feather is a platformer that combines nostalgic pixel art with the beauty of nature.



This game comes with a feature-rich level editor that is easy to learn, but here's the catch: Any level you create belongs to YOU and can be shared and played by anyone in the world, regardless of whether or not they themselves own a copy of Single Feather.

Express your creativity with the level editor. Share your levels with friends or a community of other players. Unlock features by progressing through the campaign of levels.
detailed_description:
Dr. Agnes Shelley wants to steal your eggs, but you're not about to let that happen. Single Feather is a platformer that combines nostalgic pixel art with the beauty of nature.



This game comes with a feature-rich level editor that is easy to learn, but here's the catch: Any level you create belongs to YOU and can be shared and played by anyone in the world, regardless of whether or not they themselves own a copy of Single Feather.

Express your creativity with the level editor. Share your levels with friends or a community of other players. Unlock features by progressing through the campaign of levels.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

name: Single Feather

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires OpenGL

short_description: A charming platformer about a duck and a scientist who don't get along. Encounter other animals, collect stars, and fight Dr. Agnes Shelly, all in an effort to save your babies. Create your own levels and share them with the world.
